Kompanen! Kompaan is in crisis! Due to the Coronavirus, it’s all hands on deck to save our company in this difficult time. We’ve launched a series of initiatives to sail through this storm of uncertainty, and we need all the help we can get! We’re relying on you, Kompaan!
